item.description:
Good News Everyone!
Sci-Fi/Fantasy group of Boston has been debating making a book club for some time and its finally happening! The second Wednesday of every month will be our day of choice baring public outcry.

After careful consideration and input from the Meetup members, we decided on having the event in the Borders Bookstore on Boylston Street (say that three times fast...). I am told there is a cafe upstairs with plenty of seating which is where we will be meeting. The store should be relatively easy to get to, the closest T-stop is Compley Station on the Green line. If you know of a cheap place to park on Boylston street, let the rest of Boston know...

For the first book, we wanted something well known. Something people have probably already read but wouldn't mind reading again and chatting about. So for our first book, we figured either Snow Crash or Neuromancer. Let us know which you prefer when you sign up!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the cafe upstairs wearing something nerdy and most likely a scaly cap :-)
item.name: SciFi Boston's First Book Club Meeting!!
